successes.title: PrioVR: Suit up. Game on.
successes.description: Immerse yourself in the future of gaming - PrioVR.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! : Be a part of virtual reality history and as a thank you, we’ll include your name in our honor roll of backers on the PrioVR website.

ACTUAL THANK YOU CARD : You’ll receive a special actually-made-out-of-paper-and-sent-through-the-mail thank you card from the YEI Technology team + we’ll include your name in our honor roll of backers on the PrioVR website.
POSTER : Sharpen your interior decorating skills with a limited edition PrioVR poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers on the PrioVR website.
T-SHIRT : Wear your support for PrioVR on your sleeve with an only-available-on-Kickstarter PrioVR t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers on the PrioVR website.
FLASK : A PrioVR logo laser engraved flask? Yes please. + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers on the PrioVR website = Awesome

DEMO GAME CREDIT : Have you ever wanted to be in a video game? Now’s your chance! We’ll include a shout out to you in a demo game by including your name in the credits. We’ll even throw in everything from the previous reward tiers too!

(EARLY BIRD) PRIO-VR LITE: The moment you’ve all been waiting for - Take home your very own PrioVR Lite, an upper body version for some quality couch time. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

PRIO-VR LITE : The moment you’ve all been waiting for - Take home your very own PrioVR Lite, an upper body version for some quality couch time. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

(EARLY BIRD) PRIO-VR CORE : Forget Whac-a-Mole when you can Kick-a-Zombie! That’s what you get when the PrioVR Core adds your lower body to the action. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

PRIO-VR CORE : Forget Whac-a-Mole when you can Kick-a-Zombie! That’s what you get when the PrioVR Core adds your lower body to the action. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

(EARLY BIRD) PRIO-VR PRO : We’ve added additional sensors for professional quality motion capture. Perfect for game developers looking for that little something extra. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

PRIO-VR PRO : We’ve added additional sensors for professional quality motion capture. Perfect for game developers looking for that little something extra. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

JOIN THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE : A PrioVR Pro and your face, as a zombie, in one of our demo games. You’ll be the envy of the undead for spaghetti night. Includes demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

HEAD-TO-HEAD PACK : Want to play with a friend? The Head-to-Head Pack contains 2 PrioVR Pros each with their own demo games and hand controllers + 2 flasks + 2 t-shirts + 2 posters + thank you card + honor roll of backers. Sharing optional. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

DEVELOPER PACK : You’ll get a hot-off-the-press PrioVR Pro with 10 hours of support from the YEI Technology team to help integrate PrioVR with your game. You’ll also get demo games and hand controllers + flask + t-shirt + poster + thank you card + honor roll of backers. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

ONE OF THE FIRST: A specially numbered (2-10) PrioVR Pro (demo games and hand controllers) and a terrible, homemade thank you card. And we’ll even throw in the flask + t-shirt + poster + honor roll of backers too. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)

THE FIRST: The absolute first, specially numbered (1) PrioVR Pro (demo games and hand controllers) and the worst homemade thank you card ever made. And since you’re so kind, we’ll also throw in the flask + t-shirt + poster + honor roll of backers too. (International Taxes / Tariffs not included)
